components.name: ngr-api
components.notes: ASP.NET Core 8 Web API hosted on Azure App Service (Linux). Okta JWT validation middleware. Entity Framework Core 8 with Azure SQL Database. Azure Key Vault for secrets. Serilog structured logging.

components.name: ngr-web-app
components.notes: React 18 TypeScript SPA hosted on Azure App Service. Okta Auth JS SDK for OIDC login. Protected routes. Pages: patient roster, eCRF forms, reports, content management, CSV import.

components.name: ngr-database
components.notes: Azure SQL Database (Business Critical tier). EF Core 8 entity classes, ApplicationDbContext, migrations, T-SQL schema scripts, seed data. Tables: Patients, Encounters, FormDefinitions, FormSubmissions, Reports, Users, Roles, AuditLog, Programs, Content.
